TextView.android:text: Preheat oven to 180C/350F/Gas mark 4. Place the chocolate, butter and sugar in a pan and gently melt and combine. Once melted, remove from the heat and leave to cool completely. Add the eggs in 1 at a time, mixing well between each addition. Sift in the flour and cocoa powder, then fold in the raspberries. Pour the mixture into a greased and lined 30cm x 24cm baking tray. Bake for approx. 30 minutes. Once baked, allow to cool completely before lifting out of the tray and cutting into squares.
